body:
That was the recommendation once, but we changed it to recommend the version of the tour that comes with the Go installation.

A major benefit of this approach is that the user doesn't need to have `GOPATH` set up to run the tour.

The notable drawback is that—if the tour has changed since the last release—the local version will be out of sync with the web version. I don't think this is a big deal.

@campoy, what do you think?
